Object.Field: Cartella in cui vengono salvati i report in formato HTML. Creare la cartella in quanto non esiste
Mittente da cui inviare le mail
aspmx.l.google.com can send mail without authentication to Gmail Addresses

Elenco dei destinatari a cui arrivano le mail bloccanti di errore; separare gli indrizzi con la virgola e basta (etl@sedapta.com,altronome@sedapta.com) edoardo.tomeno@sedapta.com,annalisa.ilgrande-ext@kering.com,duccio.ruggeri@kering.com,gianluca.miglietti@kering.com

<@
import java.sql.Connection;
import java.sql.Statement;
import java.sql.DriverManager;
import java.sql.ResultSet;
import java.sql.ResultSetMetaData;

Connection Javaconn=odiRef.getJDBCConnection("SRC");
Statement stmt=Javaconn.createStatement();

String my_query="SELECT ERROR_MESSAGE FROM <?=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "SNP_LPI_STEP_LOG", "ORACLE_REPWORK", "D") ?> SLG JOIN (SELECT I_LP_STEP, I_LP_INST FROM <?=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "SNP_LPI_EXC_LOG", "ORACLE_REPWORK", "D") ?> WHERE I_LP_INST = (SELECT I_LP_INST FROM <?=odiRef.getObjectName("L", "SNP_LP_INST", "ORACLE_REPWORK", "D") ?> WHERE GLOBAL_ID ='<?=odiRef.getLoadPlanInstance("BATCH_GUID") ?>') AND NB_RUN = <?=odiRef.getLoadPlanInstance("RESTART_ATTEMPTS") ?> AND SESS_NO  = <?=odiRef.getSession("SESS_NO") ?> ) ELG ON SLG.I_LP_STEP = ELG.I_LP_STEP and SLG.I_LP_INST=ELG.I_LP_INST";

ResultSet rs=stmt.executeQuery(my_query);
ResultSetMetaData md=rs.getMetaData();

int numColumns=md.getColumnCount();

String strTemp="";
String result="";

if (0 == 1 && 0 == 0 )
{

//Intestazione
for (int i=1; i<numColumns+1; i++) {
  if (i==numColumns){
    result+=md.getColumnName(i);
  }
  else
  {
    result+=md.getColumnName(i)+";";
  }	
}

//A capo
result+=(char)10;

}

//Record
while (rs.next()) {

	for (int i=1; i<numColumns+1; i++) {
                
                //Come vengono trattati i nulli
		if (rs.getString(md.getColumnName(i))== null)
			strTemp="";
		else {
			strTemp=rs.getString(md.getColumnName(i));		
		}
                if (i==numColumns){
                  result+=strTemp+(char)10;
                }
                else{
                  result+=strTemp+";";
                }
	}
}

stmt.close();
Javaconn.close();
@>

OdiSendMail "-MAILHOST=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailHost" "-PORT=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailPort" "-PROTOCOL=smtp" "-AUTH=YES" "-AUTHMECHANISMS=LOGIN" "-USER=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailUser" "-FROM=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailFrom" "-SUBJECT=Errore load plan <?=odiRef.getLoadPlanInstance("LOAD_PLAN_NAME") ?>" "-TO=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_MailToError" "-ATTACH=#GLOBAL.GLOBAL_ErrorFolder\LP_PROD_Error.txt" Il load plan di #GLOBAL.ORACLE_ContextCode <?=odiRef.getLoadPlanInstance("LOAD_PLAN_NAME") ?> è andato in errore, vedi allegato.
